name: Spooky Scary Strange House
description:
The atmosphere is spooky, you don’t remember what happened but, now you see a strange house with eerie furniture and scary big doors! The strange house appears to be a ghost house full of eerie bogeyman! Terror and fear is creeping up your neck giving Goosebumps all over your body, where could you be? Is this a nightmare? THUMP! This couldn’t be happening, the spooky room happens to talk scary noise!
Are you trapped? NO! This can’t be, last time you checked you were sleeping in your cozy room. Your head feels like heavy with spooky and scary knocking noise mixed with terror winds full of fear. Now you remember! While you were sleeping, you heard a knocking noise on your door, it was suppose to be your be your parents checking up on you but this time it was something strange! It was that virtual spooky neighbor you saw kidnapping your friend last night! He had come to render you your deserved punishment for sneaking in on the evil scary neighbor! Curse the hour! He has kidnapped you in this strange ghost house for an unintentional sin occurred on your expense; you need to try to attempt at the neighbors escape.
In this scary spooky creeping survival game you are trapped and you can only escape once you find the required number of keys to unlock the horror haunted house gates! But if during your escape challenge you are spotted by the sneaking evil virtual neighbor she will give you a scary lethal punishment! You have to devise an escape plan game to save yourself from the spooky neighbor; you’re trapped in solitude in this quest of scary house escape for five days!
You got to help yourself out, look around sneaking in every strange spooky room without making any knocking noise and search for the key to the haunted house. Keep track of time! You only have 5 days to escape the sneaking evil neighbor and the haunted neighborhood after which you will become a prisoner forever among the scary lot of bogeyman and the evil neighbor!
In this eerie ghost house rescue game you can use screen controls like joystick to move around from one spooky room to another searching for the key. The hand button on the screen will help you search the horror house for the key, find the key in just five days to win the escape challenge!
Although this time the scary neighbor escape survival game offers you three characters to chose from, one male neighbor and two scary female neighbors! But you can only unlock the evil and scary neighbor characters by earning coins through watching a video. Isn’t it an easy survival game play? When you know that now you can also enjoy terror and fear filled scary sound effects topping it all!
So download the scary neighbor haunted house game now and enjoy the nightmare of an esacpe challenge!
HOW TO PLAY GAME:
-Begin the scary neighbor game
-Select scary neighbor character
-You are trapped in the spooky room in a haunted neighborhood
-Use joystick and hand button controls control movements
-If you spot the scary evil neighbor, hide immediately
-Keep a track of your health meter
-Move from on strange room to another spooky one SILENTLY
-Use game play icons to find key in other rooms
-Once you spot the key, hide from being trapped againMaking no knocking noise -------unlock the horror house gates
-Watch video to unlock other characters
FEATURES OF THE GAME:
-Haunted house simulation
-3 characters, 1 male and 2 female
-Horror sound effects
-On screen controls as joystick and hand button
-Escape challenge game
-Watch video to unlock characters
-Heath meter
-3D graphics
-Creeping fear game play
